entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING IN EFFECT, Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:31 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 4:43 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
Condition: Rain
Temperature: 10.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 10.4°C
Wind: NNE 22 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending after midnight then clearing. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 15 to 25 mm except 10 mm over western sections. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 19. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
